import console;
module util {
	print: (m){console.log(m);};
};
export class Foo {
	use util;
	init: (v){this.v = isFinite(v) ? v:0, this;};
	print: (m){util.print(m), this;};
	class self.Bar {
		extends Foo;
		'+': (v){isFinite(v) ? v:this.v;};
		print: (v){super(this + v);};
	};
};
fb = new Foo.Bar();
fb.print(10);
